general_titles: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration and Management (BSBA)
general_texts: Students in the Bachelor of Science in Business Administration and Management (BSBA) program are to complete 45 semester credits applicable to the GE Breadth within the applicable areas (see general education breadth template for specifics), 39 core semester credits, 24 elective semester credits and 12 semester credits towards the selected concentration category. Please connect with advisor for recommended course progression of program and view full program details and transfer information can be located within the university catalog. Please note: any potential transfer found must be completed with a final grade of C or higher, worth 3 semester credits, and can only be applied to one area of the degree program, including the GE breadth.

general_titles: Bachelor of Science in Health Sciences (BSHS) Health Education Track
general_texts: Students within the Bachelor of Science in Health Sciences (BSHS) program of the Health Education Track are to complete 45 semester credits towards the GE breadth (see General Education Breadth template for specifics), including the pre-requisites of the GE applicable areas (The following general education courses or equivalent for the BSHS Health Education track must be taken: ANT 106, BIO 201, BIO 202, HEA 229, MIC 206, PSY 101 and STA 206), 39 core semester credits, 24 semester credits towards the elective category and 12 semester credits towards the concentration category. Please connect with an advisor for the recommended course progression. Full program details and transfer information can be viewed within the university catalog. Please note: any potential transfer found must be completed with a final grade of C or higher, worth 3 semester credits, and can only be applied to one area of the degree program, including the GE breadth.

general_titles: Bachelor of Arts in Psychology (BA Psych)- Human Services Concentration
general_texts: Students within the Bachelor of Arts in Psychology (BA Psych) program with the Human Services Concentration are to complete 45 semester credits of the GE breadth in the applicable areas (see general education breadth template for specifics), 30 semester credits towards the core, 30 semester credits towards the elective category and 15 semester credits towards the concentration category. Please connect with advisor for recommended course progression of program. Full program information and transfer details can be located within the university catalog. Please note: any potential transfer found must be completed with a final grade of C or higher, worth 3 semester credits, and can only be applied to one area of the degree program, including the GE breadth.

general_titles: Bachelor of Arts in Social Work (BSW)
general_texts: Students within the Bachelor of Arts in Social Work (BSW) program are to complete 45 semester credits applicable to the GE Breadth within the applicable areas (see general education breadth template for specifics), 51 core semester credits, 24 semester credits towards the elective category. Please connect with advisor for recommended course progression of program. This program requires 450 hours of practicum in an approved social work agency. View full program details and transfer information can be found within the university catalog. Please note: any potential transfer found must be completed with a final grade of C or higher, worth 3 semester credits, and can only be applied to one area of the degree program, including the GE breadth.
